titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at the Cathedral Church of Worcester upon the thanksgiving-day, April 16, 1696 by W. Talbot ...
titleStmt.author: Talbot, William, 1658 or 9-1730.

notesStmt.note: "Publish'd at the request of the mayor and alderman of that city."
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
